name: Shadow Era: Shattered Fates - Cross Platform Card Game
blurb: We need your help to take Shadow Era to the next level and release the third set of this highly rated, cross-platform TCG!

rewards.reward: 10 digital Shattered Fates booster packs ($10 value).\r\n    1,000 shadow crystals ($10 value).\r\n    Early Beta Access.
